author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: Don't be fooled by this seemingly innocuous orange-yellow long, fruity cocktail. It packs a serious punch with sweet almond notes masking its rum, gin and brandy.
name: Fog Cutter
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
FLOAT sherry on top of drink
